nodes.text: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 19

Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 19 is the nineteenth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith. It was written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Giuseppe Camuncoli, and published on August 8, 2018 by Marvel Comics.
"FORTRESS VADER" BEGINS! A JEDI makes a desperate deal. THE INQUISITORS' mission evolves. DARTH VADER discovers a theft.
The main cover art for the comic book is a variation of Tom Jung's style A poster of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope .

In Darth Vader 19, a panel features a list of Jedi survivors. Two of the names are "Selrahc Eluos" and "Ka-Moon Kholi," which are tuckerisms of author Charles Soule and artist Giuseppe Camuncoli, respectively.
